summary: This mod adds a new companion , a clown named Arkham Fallek .
descriptionHtml:
Description:
 
Arkham Fallek - I used to be a court jester in Solitude, but he was accused of conspiring with Ulfric petrels and he was forced to flee the city. Those guards and mercenaries that tried to catch his waiting sad uchast.Posle as Arkham lost everything, he started going crazy, emaciated, caught the infection from the attack and began to rot skeever alive .Half alive, he got to the den to tell fortunes, and gave them all that he had and asked them to heal himself. Partially Arkham recovered, but started to get a kick out of that took away lives of innocent people and thus to work for someone or for that would take away more and more innocent lives he will be only joy .
 
Location:
 
Tavern "Bannered Mare"
 
Update:
 
New corrected armor.
Added minor "cosmetic" work on the arm and leg.
In the inventory Ekrama you will have to wait one more interesting fact spells, which will allow you to call to his aid the armored troll (a troll is not normal, to tell the truth is a completely new model)
Question to the public:
What weapon would you like to see?
 
Setting:
 
Copy the files from the archive in the fashion Skyrim / data, connect esp. in the launcher.
 
Removal:
 
Delete files from the mod Skyrim / data.
author: Drow33
